## BasicExtrudedLineTechniqueParams interface

Declares a a geometry as a basic extruded line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BasicExtrudedLineTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams, PolygonalTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [caps](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.caps.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"None" \| "Circle"&gt; | Style of both end caps. Possible values: <code>&quot;None&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Circle&quot;</code>. A value of undefined maps to <code>&quot;Circle&quot;</code>. |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a line in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Width of line in meters for different zoom levels. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent lines, set a value between 0.0 for totally transparent, to 1.0 for totally opaque. |
|  [shading](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.shading.md) | "basic" | A value determining the shading technique. Valid values are "Basic" and "Standard". Default is "Basic".<code>&quot;basic&quot;</code> : Simple shading, faster to render. Only simple color and opacity are effective. <code>&quot;standard&quot;</code>: Elaborate shading, with metalness, and roughness.<!-- -->TODO: is this TechniqueParams or Style prop ? |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to <code>true</code> if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. |
|  [wireframe](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechniqueparams.wireframe.md) | boolean | A value of <code>true</code> creates a wireframe geometry. (May not be supported with all techniques). |
